Title: Prohibits insurers from refusing to renew a policy on certain automobiles used for volunteer social service transportation
Summary: Prohibits insurers from refusing to renew a policy on certain automobiles used for volunteer social service transportation; distinguishes automobiles used for volunteer social service transportation from transportation company network vehicles and livery vehicles.
LawCode: Amd §3425, Ins L; amd §§1691 & 121-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting insurers from refusing to renew a policy on certain automobiles used for volunteer social service transportation; and to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to distinguishing automobiles used for volunteer social service transportation from transportation company network vehicles and livery vehicles
